body:
Hello, i would like to announce our first unofficial tournament, The Desolation Of Gamemodes.

My co-hosts during this tournament are:  LythureIsBack, iwishbro, Coco_stag and poofywoo. (The Dev needs to fix tags there not working again...)

We are all new to this tournament making, however I do believe we are all excellent organizers. 

Gamemode: Each round the gamemode will change:

Round 1:   Destroy The Monument (40 minutes max)
Round 2:   Team Death Match (15 minutes max (most kills at the end wins))
Round 3:   King Of The Hill (15 minutes max (team with most controlled area wins))
Round 4:   Capture The Wool (45 minutes max (team with most touches/caps wins)
Round 5:   5cp (15 minutes max ( team with most control wins))
Round 6:   Frenzy (15 minutes max)
Round 7:   Capture The Flag (15 minutes max ( team with most captures wins))

If only a few teams sign up and there is only 2 rounds, then only round 1 and 2 gamemodes will be played. On the other hand, if 25 teams sign up and there is more than 7 rounds, the rounds will just cycle.

An extra 10-20 minutes will be given when a tie occurs.

Format: The format is a round robin, meaning every team will play each other. Due to the way the gamemodes work you may play different teams for different gamemodes. Please also bear in mind this will take up a lot of time depending on the amount of teams signing up. 

Match Information: A minimum of 6 players must be fielded, but a maximum of 8 players can be fielded, These may differ depending on gamemodes. You may switch out players if the replacing person is part of the team. A win is 3 points, a lose is 1 point and a tie if it rarely occurs will be 2 points.

Rules: You must follow all rules that apply to Avicus: https://avicus.net/rules , Official Avicus tournaments rules apply.

Apply here: https://goo.gl/forms/cxP7wYG3bOSmlgj22

Deadline for applications is 2 weeks from now, 28th of March.

Map Pool: To be Determined.

Important Dates: Will be In April 3rd-25th, Will be more exact when i get an idea of how many rounds there will be (due to team size)

If you would like to Stream/referee please contact me on discord:   Rockyyyyy#8427

Streamers:

Rockyyyyy
Zic_e



Referees:

Kojapan

Jaystre


Thank you for your time, i would love to hear feedback or question, as this is my first time doing this. Tell me if i need to add something and i will do!

Regards, Rockyyyyy.

replies.body:
[Update] 

So as i said earlier, the deadline has been reached. The following teams have signed up:
  • NewDawn
  • Apollo
  • Team Allah
  • BullDogs
  • Team Rocket
  • Sagrevyum
  • Home
  • Horizon
I have made a tournament bracket, the games will be as followed:    http://challonge.com/DesolationOfGamemodes

As there are 8 teams, there are 7 rounds. Meaning all posted in the original post are to be played:   DTM, TDM, KOTH, CTW, 5CP, Frenzy and CTF.

Destroy the Monument matches have now been changed to 35 minutes max.
Timezone:  BST  (Which is GMT +1 as the clocks when forward recently)

The matches will be played on scrim servers which will allow us to play any map loaded onto Avicus, as i can't be sure that they won't crash any games that are delayed due to a crash occurring will be delayed until the end of sunday. As you all want to know the unofficial tournament will  be on April 8th, 2017 starting at 16:00 BST (4pm)
It will run onto sunday, Time Table;

Saturday:

Round 1:  4pm bst 
Round 2:  6pm bst
Round 3:  8pm bst
Round 4:  10pm bst

Sunday:

Round 5: 6pm bst
Round 6: 8pm bst
Round 7: 10pm bst 


Only one game will be played of each gamemode, there will be scrim01 and scrim02 booked on every time said above so there will be 2 games played at once on different scrim servers. Then teams will swap who is playing who then the game mode will be over. In short, you will only play one match of each gamemode. Do remember there are 7 gamemodes. Of course i realise it is spanned across a long time but if matches end early the we not stick to the time table, so get it done quick and we can do it on the saturday :)

The results will be given out the following weekend. I was thinking of a prize:  The winning team gets to select a player that does not already have a donator rank on there team, who they think played particularly well. Then i will buy them a Gold or Emerald rank :)  I thought this offered it a bit more of a competitive edge rather than just knowing you won. This person is like a "Man of the Match"

All teams that have no teamspeak server, i suggest you ping an official over discord. Explaining that you need a temporary team speak channel for the tournament. 
Your team must be in an official Avicus team speak channel (Not on own discord/Skype call etc.)

Putting off the map pool further xD I would like to quickly say that a team which doesn't show up will get zero points for that game and the team they are facing will get a point.

How points are worked out:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qwABHT3KKhfRRRVrsSHx_Bg7iEdYsA3AO5OoPRbSapk/edit#gid=0


So the map pool:

Just a quick point that you need to vote on the maps you want, there can only be one for each gamemode, anyone can vote.
https://goo.gl/forms/NATTtGgKhswvHNaq1

Votes will end on sunday.

Still need referees and some media to stream would be great too!
Thanks for your time.

replies.body:
[Update]

The Map Pool!

I sent out a survey recently, from these results I have decided the Map Pool. So due to popular demand:

DTM: Senex Scrim

TDM: Actrix TE

KOTH: City Scape

CTW: Hold Fast

5CP: Fossil 5CP

Frenzy: Asylum

CTF: Wool terrace


Only one map will be played per gamemode.

If you have any question please ask below.  :)
replies.body_tagged:

If you have any question please ask below.  :)

replies.body:
Hey,

I would like to thanks all the teams that signed up. 

The Results: 

1st place: Horizon, Apollo and Team Allah (all managed to get the same amount of points)

2nd place: NewDawn

3rd place: HOME

4th place: Team Rocket, Sagrevyum and Bulldogs. 

The winners decided to split up the prize and not to play tie breaker. 

Thank you all for playing or helping. I will probably leave this to officials from now on xD

To the winners: Well done you should all find yourself 8.06 richer, once the money has gone through. :D
